data.name: Marooned
data.detailed_description:
Your boat crashed on the deserted tropical island, and you have to
escape from it.

You need to fix the boat and collect enough food and water.

Search for coconuts, mangos, and eggs on the island, look under rocks
for scorpions, look on the shore for crabs and clams. Collect firewood
to make fire. Fire gives you warmth. Also, you can cook and boil water
on fire. Remember, you cannot drink ocean water, and raw water can
make you sick; to make it safe, you have to boil it.

On the shore, you can find baskets, bottles, fishing lines, and
planks. You need planks to fix your boat.

Monitor your temperature. Heat and cold make you lose your
energy. Sleeping helps restore your energy, but hunger or thirst will
make you more tired while your sleeping. Fire gives your warms, going
into water cools you down.

If you like the idea of simple game mechanics, you may like this
game. Try it!
data.about_the_game:
Your boat crashed on the deserted tropical island, and you have to
escape from it.

You need to fix the boat and collect enough food and water.

Search for coconuts, mangos, and eggs on the island, look under rocks
for scorpions, look on the shore for crabs and clams. Collect firewood
to make fire. Fire gives you warmth. Also, you can cook and boil water
on fire. Remember, you cannot drink ocean water, and raw water can
make you sick; to make it safe, you have to boil it.

On the shore, you can find baskets, bottles, fishing lines, and
planks. You need planks to fix your boat.

Monitor your temperature. Heat and cold make you lose your
energy. Sleeping helps restore your energy, but hunger or thirst will
make you more tired while your sleeping. Fire gives your warms, going
into water cools you down.

If you like the idea of simple game mechanics, you may like this
game. Try it!
data.short_description: "Marooned" is a primitive survival game. One inventory slot, simple crafting system.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K / AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6 GB / Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
